ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 69
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Please forget about that sleep skill. There s no point in it. Why would sleep be warrior only skill? Why would you be able to chat while sleeping? The
ygData.messageBody:
>Personally, i feel that warriors should have a sleeping ability, but not to
>the extent that all goes black. It should be just like medditate, exit
>when you want, and you can still type, just you can't see what is going on.
> So, a mediate for warriors is the one thing that will help a lot, well
>thats what i think. It just takes me too long to get back all that
>health...

Please forget about that sleep skill. There's no point in it. Why would
sleep be warrior only skill? Why would you be able to chat while sleeping?
The downtime is here for a reason, when you want to cut it down, team with
priests classes.

Thormael
